alert.note: Alert for Logan; Morgan; Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 28 at 5:29PM MDT until May 28 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Far Northeastern Weld County in northeastern Colorado... Northeastern Morgan County in northeastern Colorado... Southwestern Logan County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 600 PM MDT. * At 528 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stoneham, or 22 miles west of Sterling, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Pawnee Pass around 535 PM MDT. Willard around 545 PM MDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
